# Varity Developer Portal

> Varity is a Web3 operating system that enables developers to deploy decentralized applications with 70-85% lower infrastructure costs than AWS. The Developer Portal is where developers submit and manage their apps on the Varity App Store.

## Quick Facts
- Revenue Split: 70% to developer, 30% to Varity platform
- Review Time: 24 hours for most applications
- Infrastructure Savings: 70-85% compared to AWS/GCP/Azure
- Chain: Varity L3 (Arbitrum Orbit rollup, Chain ID 33529)

## Core Features
- Submit enterprise applications to the Varity App Store
- 70% developer revenue share (industry-leading)
- 24-hour review process
- GitHub integration for auto-fill
- Developer dashboard for app management
- Real-time analytics and metrics

## Key Technologies
- Blockchain: Varity L3 (Arbitrum Orbit)
- Authentication: Privy (email, social, wallet)
- Smart Contracts: thirdweb v5
- Compute: Akash Network (decentralized)
- Storage: IPFS/Filecoin (decentralized)

## Pages

### Homepage
- [Developer Portal Home](https://developer.store.varity.so/): Main landing page with value proposition and submission CTA

### App Submission
- [Submit Your App](https://developer.store.varity.so/submit/): Application submission form with GitHub integration

### Developer Dashboard
- [Dashboard](https://developer.store.varity.so/dashboard/): Manage submitted applications, track status, view analytics

## Related Resources
- [Varity Documentation](https://docs.varity.so): Complete SDK and API documentation
- [Varity Main Site](https://varity.so): Company information and products
- [Varity App Store](https://store.varity.so): Consumer-facing app marketplace
